name: Buzzkill (Zouru)
description:
My entry for WGJ 117

!README!

Wearing headphones is HIGHLY recommended for this game. I'm not sure if you can play it without. Don't say I didn't warn you

!README!

This is definitely one of my more experimental games. You'll need to locate mosquitos by following their sound and trying to guess if and where they landed. I think it turned out quite interesting, let me know what you thinkl!

Controls:

 - drag the scanner using LMB

- rotate scanner by dragging with LMB one of the audio cones

- scan for stationary mosquitos by holding RMB in one of the audio cones

- click with LMB a marked mosquito to kill it
